block.p: LEAD: Stephanie Beth Feinstein, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Hyman Feinstein of Brooklyn, was married last evening at the Park Avenue Synagogue in New York to Alan Jonathan Marquesano, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Daniel Marquesano of New York. Rabbi David H. Lincoln officiated.

LEAD: Stephanie Beth Feinstein, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Hyman Feinstein of Brooklyn, was married last evening at the Park Avenue Synagogue in New York to Alan Jonathan Marquesano, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Daniel Marquesano of New York. Rabbi David H. Lincoln officiated.

Stephanie Beth Feinstein, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Hyman Feinstein of Brooklyn, was married last evening at the Park Avenue Synagogue in New York to Alan Jonathan Marquesano, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Daniel Marquesano of New York. Rabbi David H. Lincoln officiated.

Mrs. Marquesano, 25 years old, is an associate in the New York law firm of Parker Chapin Flattau & Klimpl. She is a graduate of Brooklyn College with a law degree from New York University. The bridegroom, 27, is a graduate of Syracuse University and a candidate for an M.B.A. at Pace University. He is the vice president of sales and marketing at Total Building Maintenance, a commercial cleaning company in New York.
